content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position (5.0, 5.0)
Used to smelt iron ore (with coal) into iron plates for resource conversion.  
Consists of the furnace identified at (5.0, 5.0).

### Copper Smelting Furnace at Position (-27.0, -60.0)
Used to smelt copper ore (with coal) into copper plates for copper cable production.  
Consists of the copper furnace identified at (-27.0, -60.0).

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Call Errors with get_entities:
  – Avoid using unexpected keyword arguments (such as "radius") and extra positional parameters. Always check the function’s signature before calling.

• Lab Placement Issues:
  – Before attempting to place a Lab at (0.5, 2.5), verify the lab is available in inventory to prevent placement failures.

• Handling Null Returns:
  – When filtering for lab entities, ensure the result is not None (implement a fallback to an empty list) to avoid iteration errors.

• Lab Crafting Resource Shortages:
  – Multiple lab crafting attempts failed due to missing sub-ingredients (e.g. iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, copper-cables). Secure sufficient resources and pre-craft all prerequisite components before attempting lab production.

• Crafting Chain Dependencies:
  – Verify the entire resource and production chain is complete prior to advanced crafting steps to avoid cascading ingredient shortages.
